sentences: Hän löysi vanhan metallin palan metsästä.
context: Metalli is the Finnish word for metal. It declines based on case, as shown in the dictionary definition provided. The plural form is metallit. Possessive forms also exist to indicate ownership (e.g., metallini - my metal).  The suffix '-inen' can be added to create adjectives related to metal, like 'metallinen' meaning metallic.
